sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for August 14 - 15

event: A Midsummer Night's Run in downtown Lexington.  Please see street closures below.

day: Street Closure Scheduled for E Short St at N Martin Luther King Blvd:
Street Closure Scheduled for E Short St at N Martin Luther King Blvd:
event: E Short St closed at N Martin Luther King Blvd for necessary water main repair.

day: Street Closure Scheduled for E Short St at N Martin Luther King Blvd:
event: Detour via Corral St and Elm Tree Ln.

day: Street Closures for A Midsummer Night's Run - Saturday 8/14:
event: Fastest Kid in Town at 5:30 p.m. - Limestone between Main/Barr and Short at Upper.

day: Street Closures for A Midsummer Night's Run - Saturday 8/14:
event: Full route closure from approx 7 pm to 9 pm:  All of Midland Ave, Short between Upper/Midland, and Main/Richmond from Limestone to Chinoe Rd.

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Currently in progress thru Labor Day weekend with work scheduled 24 hrs/day.  Two lanes closed and two lanes open (including the shoulder).

day: Bridge Deck Overlay Work for I-75S at the Clays Ferry Bridge:
event: Speed limit is 55 mph.  Motorists can expect delays in this area.
